example.title: Digital functional tests
example.shortdesc: In this code example, various digital functional tests are performed. In which, digital patterns are applied and digital capture is used to obtain the results.

ul.li: Digital functional test using a pattern executed with a simple test method
Digital functional test using a pattern executed with a test method containing parameters for datalogging
Digital functional test using a pattern in X3 mode
Digital capture for a block of 16 signals and 8 vectors
Digital capture for a block of 16 signals and 20480 vectors in addition to "release tester"
Digital functional test using a large pattern
